attributes.action: Resolve the continued Argentine Claim to the Falklands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Even now, 25 years on from the start of the Falklands Conflict in the South Atlantic, the Argentine population maintain that the islands are theirs. This claim has remained peaceful since the end of the war, but shouldn't the British Government do something to enforce without doubt that the islands belong to the United Kingdom?
